about.title: Family Court Rulings Search System
about.description1: This system provides comprehensive search capabilities in the family court rulings database and judicial history.
about.description2: Users can search using Arabic names and access detailed case information while ensuring privacy protection.
about.feature1: Arabic name search with right-to-left text support
about.privacyText1: All names and personal information are access-restricted and anonymized
about.privacyText2: to ensure the privacy protection of the parties involved.
